mapper.select: select u.*,u.merchant_id as merchantId,u.merchant_name as merchantName from sys_user u where u.user_id = #{value}

select id,username name,dept_Id from sys_user WHERE 1=1
AND username LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update sys_user set merchant_id=#{userId} where user_id = #{userId}
update sys_user set `password` = #{newPassword} where user_id = #{userId} and password = #{password}
mapper.select: SELECT count(MLS_USER_ID) FROM MLS_USER where USER_TEL=#{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MLS_USER ( USER_TEL , C_TIME , FX , FX1 , FX2 , PFX , FID,ROOT_ID, MERCHANT_ID,all_show ) VALUES ( #{userTel} , now() , #{fx} , #{fx1} , #{fx2} , #{pfx} , #{fid} ,#{rootId},#{merchantId},#{allShow} )
